servers/httpserver, clients/httpclient, clients/websocketclient, private/jrpc_sys

Types

ClientConfig = object
  case kind*: ClientKind
  of Http:
    httpUri*: string
  of WebSocket:
    wsUri*: string
    compression*: bool
    flags*: set[TLSFlags]
Source   Edit   
ClientKind = enum
  Http, WebSocket
Source   Edit   
RpcProxy = ref object of RootRef
  rpcHttpServer*: RpcHttpServer
  case kind*: ClientKind
  of Http:
    httpUri*: string
    httpClient*: RpcHttpClient
  of WebSocket:
    wsUri*: string
    webSocketClient*: RpcWebSocketClient
    compression*: bool
    flags*: set[TLSFlags]
Source   Edit
